rules_text:
Cumulative Upkeep {R} or 1 life [i](At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)[/i]
Creatures you don’t control are wounded. [i](If a wounded creature would be dealt damage, it’s dealt that much damage plus one instead. This effect ends when Unyielding Hemorrhage leaves.)[/i]
